Grouped_Utterances: I've been okay, I guess. Trying to keep up with the changes I mentioned. Yeah, I’ve been eating better, and I’ve started exercising a little. It feels good, but some days are harder than others. I think when I’m tired or stressed, I tend to fall back into old habits. Like, I’ll skip exercising or grab something unhealthy to eat. It felt good. I needed that. A little. I think she appreciates that I’m trying to be healthier, but sometimes I feel like I don’t want to burden her with my stress. Not really. I guess I’m just worried about adding to her stress.
A few, especially when work gets busy. I just have to remind myself to breathe.

I think I’ll try to talk to her more openly. And keep up with the meal planning and exercise. How about aiming to share one thing about your feelings with your wife this week? It doesn’t have to be anything huge—just something that’s on your mind.
